"バリドランの肉の調達":
"I need another favor. The Floating
Continent is home to something called a
Baridran...? Is that a new species of
Dragonkin? If you bring me the meat, I
can make some new dishes. Everyone on
the ship works so hard, they deserve a
treat. I'm sure they'd like to try new
exotic foods. I know I do!

※Cae de Nv.34+ Baridrans."
